name: KeepAlive
info: Whether the state of the child needs to be kept alive in a lazy-loaded list. It is the underlying implementation of AutomaticKeepAlive and is generally not used alone.

nodes.name: Introduction to KeepAlive
desc: In the Flutter framework layer, it is only used in AutomaticKeepAlive. The source code also mentions that it is rarely used alone. This example demonstrates the state keep-alive of ListView items.
